headline.main: Marco Rubio Reports Income From Book Royalties and Teaching

snippet: Marco Rubio, one of the least-wealthy candidates in the growing Republican presidential field, showed little change in his financial picture in 2014, according to disclosures released Friday.
abstract: Marco Rubio, one of the least-wealthy candidates in the growing Republican presidential field, showed little change in his financial picture in 2014, according to disclosures released Friday.
